channel.title: Project Marcbob - Ddosed out of existence
channel.description:
Welcome to a small development thread I am making for Project Marcbob AKA PMB
The launch was technically today if you have me added on MSN, but I am working on adv threads and advertising on rsps websites tomorrow, so more people will find it then.
Features -Auto Donation -Vote4Points -Website implementation (all except for forums, you have to register that separately) -100% Dwarf Cannon -All noncb Skills -Several Dung Floors -4 Custom Quests -Tons of Bosses like nex -Lots of minigames that work great -Lots of training area -Decent combat system -Donator zone -Full screen client -Gamble with an npc, flowers, or dice bag (I guess staking too :P) -Fast xp rate and good drop rate -Clan chat with lots of options -Summoning with specials -Great shops
Some random pics
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2je9p2w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/b8sj79.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z6rwpi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/sbt1s0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5piuir.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/t8vq8i.png[/img]
-The only way I will shut down this server is if we some how don't make enough for VPS costs and webhost. Otherwise I am here for the long run.
-If you would like the link to check out the server today and get a sneak preview then just PM me or check my sig.
-Also could be using some staff, of course, so hit me up if interested.

item.title: Project Marcbob - Ddosed out of existence
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Due to ddos attacks I was forced to shut down.

Xx Weed Xx:

Arrav source?

Yes, it was. Tons of kids were going, “give me source or ddos” and I was saying no so I was getting ddosed 24/7. I can’t run a server like this and no one wants to play one that is never up because of ddos attacks. I may actually use this as a base and add stuff to it but it would never be allowed to be hosted for the public. Future development would only be for further knowledge of java. The arrav source dies here. If I had ddos protection I would have kept running it and probably had already 100+ online within 2-3 days. Just being honest. Oh well, ddos protection isn’t cheap.

Thread will be bumped if I ever develop again. Probably just going to take a break from rsps for a month or two, maybe forever.

Read full topic
item.source: Project Marcbob - Ddosed out of existence

item.title: Project Marcbob - Ddosed out of existence
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

How to do construction:

  1. Get your little brother (super little, like 3 or 2), if you don’t have one, grab a kid from the street.
  2. Tell him to get 2 building blocks.
  3. Tell him to stack the two building blocks.

Done

Read full topic

item.title: Project Marcbob - Ddosed out of existence
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Welcome to a small development thread I am making for Project Marcbob AKA PMB

The launch was technically today if you have me added on MSN, but I am working on adv threads and advertising on rsps websites tomorrow, so more people will find it then.

Features
-Auto Donation
-Vote4Points
-Website implementation (all except for forums, you have to register that separately)
-100% Dwarf Cannon
-All noncb Skills
-Several Dung Floors
-4 Custom Quests
-Tons of Bosses like nex
-Lots of minigames that work great
-Lots of training area
-Decent combat system
-Donator zone
-Full screen client
-Gamble with an npc, flowers, or dice bag (I guess staking too :P)
-Fast xp rate and good drop rate
-Clan chat with lots of options
-Summoning with specials
-Great shops

Some random pics

2je9p2w.png765×499



sbt1s0.png1258×465

5piuir.png533×502

-The only way I will shut down this server is if we some how don’t make enough for VPS costs and webhost. Otherwise I am here for the long run.

-If you would like the link to check out the server today and get a sneak preview then just PM me or check my sig.

-Also could be using some staff, of course, so hit me up if interested.
